## linesToTables() function

linesToTables creates a transformationthat accepts (flux) annotated CSV lines and emits rows together with table metadata.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function linesToTables(consumer: FluxResultObserver<string[]>): CommunicationObserver<string>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  consumer | FluxResultObserver&lt;string\[\]&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
